doc.after: On October 28 1990 25 days after reunification Berlin became a Lufthansa destination again On May 18 1997 Lufthansa Air Canada Scandinavian Airlines Thai Airways International and United Airlines formed the Star Alliance the world s first multilateral airline alliance
